lead_paragraph: A purge intended to clean up the force complemented an effort by President Juan Orlando Hernández to bypass the national police in favor of a militarized force.

headline.print_headline: Honduras Fires Over Two Dozen Police Officials
headline.main: Honduras Fires Over Two Dozen Police Commanders

snippet: A purge intended to clean up the force complemented an effort by President Juan Orlando Hernández to bypass the national police in favor of a militarized force.
abstract: Over two dozen police commanders are fired in Honduras as part of effort to rid force of corrupt officers controlled by organized crime; documents show police officials were behind 2009 killing of anti-drug czar and his top adviser; move aligns with Pres Juan Orlando Hernandez efforts to implement militarized force in place of national police force.
